The Directorate combines most of the facilities support services to existing and prospective internal and external customers. This page has been developed in order to explain the many and varied services provided by the departments/sections across the Directorate. Each department and associated project/initiatives have their own links and can be found independently via the web-site A-Z

Watch out for news on exciting developments within each area and updates of project such as the new state of Sports facilities and Halls of residence Â Trinity Close. Both developments will offer state of the art facilities and services. Find out the latest news...

Why not add these links to your favourite sites!
The Directorate is split into the following departments which deliver the services as detailed

Accommodation Services:

Allocation of rooms to resident students, Accommodation policies, contracts, associated administration, accommodation research and development
Student & staff dining, hospitality catering, corporate catering, College bar
Conference and corporate event management, Sports facilities management, reception services, commercial marketing
Cleaning services, Portering, security, waste management and recycling, car park facility management, furniture procurement etc Â contacts (name, room nos, e-mail, tel nos)
How to find us on campus. The department offices are primarily located in Walsingham building except for the Domestic Services department , Id/access control & of course reception
Fairtrade Â We are an official Fairtrade College

We welcome comments and suggestions regarding the services we provide and are happy to consider any idea in relation to developing the services further. If you have a specific enquiry regarding these services please contact the department directly or alternatively contact my colleagues or myself directly.
Dominique Owen Â Director of Hospitality Services
